content.p: Sketch the graph of the line passing through {{point1}} and {{point2}}. Compute the slope, the y-intercept, and the x-intercept. Report the slope as a fraction and the intercepts as coordinates.

outtro.p: The slope is m = {{slope}}, the y-intercept is at (0,{{y_int}}), and the x-intercept is at ({{x_int}},0).
The graph is pictured below. The intercepts are in blue and the original points are in red.
